long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Many students and researchers struggle to keep track of valuable information while studying online. Our extension aims to solve this problem by collecting the text you drag and the content you study.

Most people need to quickly gather and organize study materials without hassle. This extension helps you efficiently capture and manage the information you encounter.

Features:

* Collects text you highlight and drag on any webpage.
* Tracks the content you study for easy review.
* Supports research to enhance online learning methods.

Install this extension to streamline your online study process and contribute to educational research.
